title: Why Most Bands are like Dysfunctional Families
description:
John is a musician who before COVID was managing and producing musicians but has now been sidelined. He's got a lot of wisdom about how musicians get stuck and so we compare notes on working with people. It think this is a conversation you'll enjoy. 

Professional musician then became a production person
Not book anything until 2021

Raised RC, sent to church until 17 or 18
22 years ago, self-awareness training, not political
Found myself in a position for defending myself about not knowing what was going on
Insulted into voting
Watched the election returns. I don't know what's going on
Made me interested cognitively 
Started getting into Youtube videos, interesting and useful
Most bands are dysfunctional families
Had a Sam's club membership. Lots of stuff in the book section. CS Lewis compilation
Found Jordan Peterson just before the election. Watched all of his videos. 
All this wisdom out there is in a story. It's how we relate to them.

Love the biological insight from Heather and Bret
